name: 43 SqFt Apartment
description:
You find yourself outside your hole in the wall apartment in the city. It's a rainy day, perhaps you should go inside to avoid the rain.

43  SqFt Apartment is a short non-euclidean VR player exploration game that relies solely on player locomotion, the only controllers are your legs. 

Space is manipulated to expand beyond the limitations of our 3D world, making for some impossible spaces and perplexing paradoxes.

Requirements:  2m x 2m < play space
